column5: Need a little information here. I've had Hummin Bird, Eagle and Lowrance. They all seem to work fine until the warranty runs out, except for Hummin Bird, they don't last that long. Bottom Line has a new locator called the 480 Max. Has anyone bought one yet? Any feedback? How about Bottom Line in general, I've never owned one. Do they make a quality product? Frankly, I'm getting tired of wasting my money on the rest. Any input would appreciated. Thanks in advance Bo
Ive had a bottom line 5300 for about 4 years, the GPS gave me some problems but it was actually the antenna, take a peek at garmin too
